price: “Benim yanımda söz değiştirilmez ve ben kullara asla zulmedici de değilim.”
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
